ygData.subject: Rune comments & question
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow what a long thread.  I haven t found many runes either.  I found one WAY back at the beginning and hadn t a clue one what it was for.  Of course after I
ygData.messageBody:
Wow what a long thread. I haven't found many runes either. I
found one WAY back at the beginning and hadn't a clue one what it was
for. Of course after I accidentally sold it in a pack to a vendor I found
out ... oh well...it was one I wish I had now. Isn't that the way it
always runs?
What I do to acquire runes is this, when grouped with people first
thing, I state I would appreciate if runes are found people let me have the
opportunity to purchase them or they share and I will likewise share any
items I get for loot that they want. I can't use the big bronze swords and
other warrior/larger class type items..so we do a straight across trade or
I pay a plat or something for the rune, so they get something and feel good
about it too. It is far less than I would pay at a vendor and its
generally more than they would get were they to sell to a vendor. It works
out well...everyone ends up happy in the end, and most times we get good
exp too :)
I do have one question...this may seem obvious for some, but where
do I find the tome to combine the spell components? I hail from Neriak
and I have probably just missed it. I would appreciate if anyone knows
where to find this item, please post for the dork here so I can start my
spell creation...hopefully...all the comments about the slow skill raising
that goes on makes me leery but I have to try it anyway :)


At 10:09 AM 6/22/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Jason Smith" <jj@...>
>
>I have only found about 2 runes, I am level 23... so you aren't unlucky,
>just aren't many out there... I have also found a lot of pages and words,
>20+...
> Zebbi D'Arcanus (E'Ci)
